title: Always: The Warner-Reprise Recordings 1987-1991
description: Three CDs. SoulMusic Records is proud to present a deluxe box set consisting of the two albums the group cut for Warner Brothers, 1987's All In The Name Of Love, the 1989 set We're Movin' On and Love Crazy, a third LP recorded for the Warners' imprint, Reprise Records in 1991, all with primary production by David & Wayne Lewis, and co-production by Jonathan Lewis. Extensive liner notes from renowned UK-based writer Charles Waring include new quotes from Jonathan Lewis and Rachel Oliver-Cobbin, stellar mastering from Nick Robbins and great artwork from Roger Williams make this reissue a 'must have' for Atlantic Starr's global audience.
